Title: We're Done
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Aaron Korsh, Daniel Arkin, Genevieve Sparling
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Mike's problems are compounded when Rachel reveals her secret, Harvey looks for a way to get Mike back on his feet, and Jessica gives Louis a chance to choose a reward after his big win.
